fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is a “Vampire”, you will attack them.
- You will attack “Vampires” who visit you.
- You have Basic defense and conversion immunity against “Vampires”.
- You can hear “Vampire” night chats.
- “Vampires” are Neutral roles capable of converting players to the same role as they are, or members of an evil faction in which conversion is a primary mechanic and who are capable of converting players to roles in that faction.
- When there are no “Vampires” alive, you become 67: Vigilante, but you may only shoot once.
- This role may not roll unless there is at least one “Vampire” in the game.
